org.wallerlab.yoink.api.service.adaptiveProcessor

Interface AdaptiveProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MMProcessor, QMMMProcessor, QMProcessor

    public interface AdaptiveProcessor
    this interface is to process energy and force during adaptive qm/mm.

    • Method Summary
